page.title: 08Housing in Bilbrough.
page.content: There have been more houses built in the last 30 years than in the previous 3 centuries.The oldest house is The Old Manor House built in 1670.This was partly destroyed by fire, and the new Manor was erected nearer to the church.This building is now for sale. Planning permission has been granted for a number of uses eg.as a hotel,a nursing home,a school or a multiple residence.New houses are being built nearby. The older houses are all in Main Street _ some are listed buildings. Since the war many houses have been built in Back Lane and Cat Lane.They are mostly of brick,and some are stone clad.The bigger houses are in a variety of styles.There are 4 council bungalows and 2 council houses.The school house belongs to N.Yorks.L.E.A.
